summary: The customer was looking for assistance with the product streaming service offered by Contoso Wireless. The agent explained how the service works, including the associated cost and how to get started. They also provided tips on getting the most out of the product streaming experience, such as using a reliable internet connection, setting up parental controls, using headphones, and taking advantage of featured content. Finally, they encouraged the customer to reach out again if they had any other questions or concerns.
